00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MdEdxPlot
00004 Created by:   Andrew Edmonds
00005 
00006 Contents:     One module that fills out histograms for the pulse heights, pulse shapes and the raw counts for all digitizer channels. These are all in one module to be more efficient in terms of minimising the number of times we loop through the channels.
00007 
00008 \********************************************************************/
00009

00052 std::vector<std::string> left_thick_banknames;
00053 std::vector<std::string> right_thin_banknames;

00072 INT MdEdxPlot_init()
00073 {
00074   // The dE/dx histogram is created for the left and right arms of the detector:
00075   // energy in Si1 (x-axis) vs total energy in Si1 + Si2 (y-axis)
00076 
00077   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00078   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00079       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00080 
00081     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00082     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00083 
00084     if (detname.substr(0,4) == "SiL1" && detname.substr(7,4) == "slow")
00085       left_thin_banknames.push_back(bankname);
00086     else if (detname.substr(0,4) == "SiL2" && detname.substr(5,4) == "slow")
00087       left_thick_banknames.push_back(bankname);
00088     else if (detname.substr(0,4) == "SiR1" && detname.substr(7,4) == "slow")
00089       right_thin_banknames.push_back(bankname);
00090     else if (detname.substr(0,4) == "SiR2" && detname.substr(5,4) == "slow")
00091       right_thick_banknames.push_back(bankname);
00092   }
00093 
00094   int max_adc_value = 4096; // probably want to check which channel we're in before setting this
00095   max_adc_value = 7500;
00096   // hdEdx
00097   std::string histname = "hdEdx_left";
00098   std::string histtitle = "dE/dx plot for the left arm";
00099   hdEdx_left = new TH2D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value, max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value);
00100   hdEdx_left->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse Height in Si1");
00101   hdEdx_left->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Total Pulse Height in Si1 and Si2");
00102 
00103   histname = "hdEdx_right";
00104   histtitle = "dE/dx plot for the right arm";
00105   hdEdx_right = new TH2D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value, max_adc_value,0,max_adc_value);
00106   hdEdx_right->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse Height in Si1");
00107   hdEdx_right->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Total Pulse Height in Si1 and Si2");
00108 
00109   return SUCCESS;
00110 }
00111 
00115 INT MdEdxPlot(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00116 {
00117         // Get the event number
00118         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00119 
00120         // Some typedefs
00121         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00122         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00123         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00124 
00125         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00126         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00127         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00128                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00129 
00131         // SiL
00132         // Just loop over the banks we know are connected to these detectors
00133         std::vector<std::map<double, double> > thinSiLeft_TimeHeightMaps;
00134         for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator bankNameIter = left_thin_banknames.begin();
00135              bankNameIter != left_thin_banknames.end(); bankNameIter++) {
00136 
00137           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> temp_vector = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[*bankNameIter];
00138           //skip bank if it doesen't exist
00139           if (temp_vector.size() == 0) continue;
00140           
00141           thinSiLeft_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(MakePulseTimeHeightMap(temp_vector));
00142         }
00143         std::map<double, double> thinLeftSum;
00144         if (thinSiLeft_TimeHeightMaps.size() != 0)
00145           thinLeftSum = MakePulseHeightSums(thinSiLeft_TimeHeightMaps, 1000);
00146 
00147         std::vector<std::map<double, double> > totalLeft_TimeHeightMaps;
00148         for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator leftThickIter = left_thick_banknames.begin();
00149              leftThickIter != left_thick_banknames.end(); leftThickIter++) {
00150 
00151           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> temp_vector = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[*leftThickIter];
00152           //skip bank if it doesen't exist
00153           if (temp_vector.size() == 0) continue;
00154           
00155           totalLeft_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(MakePulseTimeHeightMap(temp_vector));
00156         }
00157         if (thinLeftSum.size() != 0)
00158           totalLeft_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(thinLeftSum);
00159 
00160         std::map<double, double> totalLeftSum;
00161         if (totalLeft_TimeHeightMaps.size() != 0)
00162           totalLeftSum = MakePulseHeightSums(totalLeft_TimeHeightMaps, 1000);
00163 
00164         for (std::map<double, double>::iterator thinHit = thinLeftSum.begin(), totalHit = totalLeftSum.begin(); 
00165              thinHit != thinLeftSum.end() || totalHit != totalLeftSum.end(); thinHit++, totalHit++) {
00166 
00167           hdEdx_left->Fill((*thinHit).second, (*totalHit).second);
00168         }       
00169         //
00171 
00172 
00174         // SiR
00175         // Just loop over the banks we know are connected to these detectors
00176         std::vector<std::map<double, double> > thinSiRight_TimeHeightMaps;
00177         for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator bankNameIter = right_thin_banknames.begin();
00178              bankNameIter != right_thin_banknames.end(); bankNameIter++) {
00179 
00180           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> temp_vector = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[*bankNameIter];
00181           //skip bank if it doesen't exist
00182           if (temp_vector.size() == 0) continue;
00183           
00184           thinSiRight_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(MakePulseTimeHeightMap(temp_vector));
00185         }
00186         std::map<double, double> thinRightSum;
00187         if (thinSiRight_TimeHeightMaps.size() != 0)
00188           thinRightSum = MakePulseHeightSums(thinSiRight_TimeHeightMaps, 1000);
00189 
00190         std::vector<std::map<double, double> > totalRight_TimeHeightMaps;
00191         for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator rightThickIter = right_thick_banknames.begin();
00192              rightThickIter != right_thick_banknames.end(); rightThickIter++) {
00193 
00194           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> temp_vector = gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap[*rightThickIter];
00195           //skip bank if it doesen't exist
00196           if (temp_vector.size() == 0) continue;
00197           
00198           totalRight_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(MakePulseTimeHeightMap(temp_vector));
00199         }
00200         if (thinRightSum.size() != 0)
00201           totalRight_TimeHeightMaps.push_back(thinRightSum);
00202 
00203         std::map<double, double> totalRightSum;
00204         if (totalRight_TimeHeightMaps.size() != 0)
00205           totalRightSum = MakePulseHeightSums(totalRight_TimeHeightMaps, 1000);
00206 
00207         for (std::map<double, double>::iterator thinHit = thinRightSum.begin(), totalHit = totalRightSum.begin(); 
00208              thinHit != thinRightSum.end() || totalHit != totalRightSum.end(); thinHit++, totalHit++) {
00209 
00210           hdEdx_right->Fill((*thinHit).second, (*totalHit).second);
00211         }       
00212 
00213         return SUCCESS;
00214 }
00215 
00216 // MakePulseTimeHeightMap()
00217 // -- Takes a vector of TPulseIsland* and creates a map of pulse time and pulse height
00218 // -- This is used to add pulses for the thin Si (and also for any detectors?)
00219 std::map<double, double> MakePulseTimeHeightMap(std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses) {
00220 
00221   std::map<double, double> output;
00222 
00223   for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin(); 
00224        pulseIter != thePulses.end(); pulseIter++) {
00225 
00226     output[(*pulseIter)->GetPulseTime()] = (*pulseIter)->GetPulseHeight();
00227   }
00228 
00229   return output;  
00230 }
00231 
00232 // MakePulseHeightSums()
00233 // -- Creates a map of (time, total height) from the a vector of (time, height) maps
00234 // -- This function also checks that the pulses are within a certain time difference of each other
00235 std::map<double, double> MakePulseHeightSums(std::vector<std::map<double, double> > timeHeightMapsVector, double time_difference) {
00236 
00237   // Create the iterators
00238   std::vector<std::map<double, double>::iterator > pulseIters;
00239   std::vector<std::map<double, double>::iterator > backwardIters;
00240 
00241   for (int b = 0; b < timeHeightMapsVector.size(); b++) {
00242     pulseIters.push_back((timeHeightMapsVector.at(b)).begin()); 
00243     backwardIters.push_back((timeHeightMapsVector.at(b)).end());
00244   }
00245 
00246   // Prepare the output map:
00247   std::map<double, double> output;
00248 
00249   while ( pulseIters.size() > 0 ) {
00250 
00251     //Iterators/pointers into pulseIters and backwardIters must not be held past
00252     //one loop cycle as they may become invalidated.
00253 
00254     //Get the time of the next (unused) TPulseIslands (one from each bank)
00255     //work out which is the earliest
00256     double min_time = 99999999999.;  //something huge.
00257     for (int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b){
00258       double time = (pulseIters.at(b))->first;
00259       min_time = std::min(min_time , time);
00260       //      printf("Bank #%d: time = %f ms\n", b, time * 1e-6);
00261       //Or use GetTimeStamp()?
00262     }
00263     //    printf("Min time = %f ms\n", min_time*1e-6);
00264 
00265     //Sum all the pulseHeights at a given time 
00266     double pulseHeight = 0;
00267     double pulseTime = 0;
00268     int nSummed = 0;
00269     for (int b = 0; b < pulseIters.size(); ++b){
00270       std::pair<double, double> timeHeightPair = *(pulseIters.at(b));
00271       //Need to define a comparison for CONSISTENT_TIME
00272       if ( std::abs(timeHeightPair.first - min_time) < time_difference ) {
00273         pulseHeight += timeHeightPair.second;
00274         pulseTime += timeHeightPair.first;
00275         ++nSummed;
00276         //and increment the iterator because we used the island
00277         ++(pulseIters.at(b));
00278         //      printf("Bank #%d: height = %f, time = %f ms\n", b, timeHeightPair.second, timeHeightPair.first * 1e-6);
00279       }
00280     } // for (int b)
00281 
00282     //append to output
00283     //    printf("Summed time = %f ms, Summed height = %f\n", (pulseTime/nSummed)*1e-6, pulseHeight);
00284     output[pulseTime/nSummed] = pulseHeight;
00285 
00286 
00287     //Delete the iterators to finished banks. Go through in reverse to
00288     //avoid invalidation problems
00289     for (int b = pulseIters.size()-1; b >= 0 ; --b){
00290       if (pulseIters.at(b) == backwardIters.at(b)){
00291         pulseIters.erase(pulseIters.begin() + b);
00292         backwardIters.erase(backwardIters.begin() + b);
00293       }  
00294     } // for (int b -reversed)
00295   } // while (size > 0)
00296 
00297   return output;
00298 }
